items.label: Implementation Plan: Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics Book
Feature Specification: Humanoid Robotics Book Plan
Tasks: Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics Book
Bridging Python Agents to ROS Controllers Using rclpy
Understanding URDF (Unified Robot Description Format) for Humanoids
High-Fidelity Rendering and Human-Robot Interaction in Unity
Training AI Models with NVIDIA Isaac Sim

intro.title: Tutorial Intro
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

my-book/Intro-humanoid-robotics-book/pla.title: Implementation Plan: Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics Book

my-book/Intro-humanoid-robotics-book/spe.title: Feature Specification: Humanoid Robotics Book Plan

my-book/Intro-humanoid-robotics-book/tas.title: Tasks: Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics Book

my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/midd.title: Middleware for Robot Control
my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/midd.description: This lesson explains the role of middleware in controlling a robot’s different parts (like sensors, motors, cameras).

my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/rclp.title: Bridging Python Agents to ROS Controllers Using rclpy
my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/rclp.description: This lesson shows how Python can be used to control robots via ROS 2.

my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/ros2.title: ROS 2 Nodes, Topics, and Services
my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/ros2.description: This lesson introduces the basic building blocks of ROS 2: nodes, topics, and services.

my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/spec.title: Feature Specification: Module 1: The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)

my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/urdf.title: Understanding URDF (Unified Robot Description Format) for Humanoids
my-book/module1-ros2-nervous-system/urdf.description: This lesson explains the URDF format used to describe a robot's structure, especially humanoid robots.

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson1.title: Understanding Digital Twins
my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson1.description: This lesson explains the concept of digital twins and their role in simulating robot behavior.

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson2.title: Simulating Physics with Gazebo
my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson2.description: This lesson introduces Gazebo as a tool for realistic physics simulation.

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson3.title: High-Fidelity Rendering and Human-Robot Interaction in Unity
my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson3.description: This lesson shows how Unity provides realistic 3D visuals and interactive simulations.

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson4.title: Simulating Sensors
my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/lesson4.description: This lesson explains how digital twins simulate robot sensors for perception and navigation testing.

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/plan.title: Implementation Plan: Module 2: The Digital Twin (Gazebo & Unity)

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/spec.title: Feature Specification: Module 2: The Digital Twin (Gazebo & Unity)

my-book/module2-digital-twin-sim/tasks.title: Tasks: Module 2: The Digital Twin (Gazebo & Unity)

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson1-p.title: Understanding AI-Powered Perception and Training
my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson1-p.description: This lesson introduces the concept of AI-powered robot perception and learning.

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson2-i.title: Training AI Models with NVIDIA Isaac Sim
my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson2-i.description: This lesson explains photorealistic simulation and synthetic data generation.

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson3-i.title: Implementing Navigation with Isaac ROS
my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson3-i.description: This lesson explains hardware-accelerated VSLAM (Visual Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) and navigation.

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson4-n.title: Nav2 Path Planning
my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/lesson4-n.description: This lesson introduces bipedal humanoid robot path planning using ROS 2 Nav2.

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/plan.title: Implementation Plan: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/spec.title: Feature Specification: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)

my-book/module3-ai-robot-brain/tasks.title: Tasks: Module 3: The AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)

my-book/module4_vla/lesson1-llm-robotics.title: Convergence of LLMs and Robotics
my-book/module4_vla/lesson1-llm-robotics.description: This lesson introduces the integration of language models with robotic actions.

my-book/module4_vla/lesson2-voice-to-act.title: Voice-to-Action (OpenAI Whisper)
my-book/module4_vla/lesson2-voice-to-act.description: This lesson explains using OpenAI Whisper for voice commands.

outline.title: Book Outline: Physical AI and Humanoid Robotics

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.
